Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Lawndale, 31st, Kedzie, & 26th, due to street blockage near 26th/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Lawndale, 31st, Kedzie, & 26th, due to street blockage near 26th/Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Bryn Mawr, Ashland and Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Bryn Mawr, Ashland, then resume their normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

Allow extra travel time.
